mapper.select: select tr.role from t_role tr left join t_user_role tur on tr.id = tur.role_id where tur.uid = #{uid}
select role.role from t_role_resource trr right join t_resource resource on trr.resource_id = resource.id left join t_role role on trr.role_id = role.id where resource.url = #{url}
